original: intros X n w v f. induction n. - unfold vec_map_list. rewrite vec_0_nil. simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite vec_head_tail. unfold vec_map_list. rewrite vec_map_list_one. rewrite vec_map_list_one. rewrite IHn. apply Permutation_app. + apply Permutation_nth_error. apply Permutation_map_inv with (f := f). * rewrite map_app. apply Permutation_app_tail. apply Permutation_map, Permutation_app_comm. + apply Permutation_nth_error. apply Permutation_map with (f := f). apply Permutation_app_comm.
